pageTitle: QEP RESOURCES INC Executive Salaries & Other Compensation | Salary.com
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {3536=For its 2014 fiscal year, QEP RESOURCES INC, listed the following executives on its annual proxy statement to the SEC}
textBeforeTable: The charts on this page feature a breakdown of the total annual pay for the top executives at QEP RESOURCES INC as reported in their proxy statements. Total Cash Compensation information is comprised of yearly Base Pay and Bonuses. QEP RESOURCES INC income statements for executive base pay and bonus are filed yearly with the SEC in the edgar filing system. QEP RESOURCES INC annual reports of executive compensation and pay are most commonly found in the Def 14a documents. Total Equity aggregates grant date fair value of stock and option awards and long term incentives granted during the fiscal year. Other Compensation covers all compensation-like awards that don't fit in any of these other standard categories. Numbers reported do not include change in pension value and non-qualified deferred compensation earnings. }); }); } input.val(''); input.attr('placeholder', ''); if (input.val() == '' || input.val() == input.attr('placeholder')) { var input = $(this); $('input[placeholder]').focus(function () { } }) } input.attr('placeholder', input.data('holder')); if (input.val() == '' || input.val() == input.attr('placeholder')) { var input = $(this); $('input[placeholder]').blur(function () { else { } $('input[placeholder]').blur(setupPlaceHolder).each(setupPlaceHolder); }; } input.val(input.attr('placeholder')); input.attr('placeholder', input.data('holder')); if (input.val() == '' || input.val() == input.attr('placeholder')) { var input = $(this); var setupPlaceHolder = function () { if (!$.support.placeholder) { $('input[placeholder]').data('holder', $('input[placeholder]').attr('placeholder')); })(); return 'placeholder' in i; var i = document.createElement('input'); jQuery.support.placeholder = (function () {
